servicp: At E-Dirham we strive to give the best possible service to our customers and in order to maintain that level we continuously look into innovation. Along our Al Haslah cards we offer wide range of other services to our customers. We believe in that our services and standards should give a feeling of convenience, easiness and security at all times.

servicetype.title: Prepaid and Credit Cards
servicetype.servip: Payment for service fees for e-Dirham subscribed entities is not limited to e-Dirham cards.The system will accept payments through any Visa or MasterCard via Points of Sale Terminals (EFTPOS) and the Internet (EIPG).

servicetype.title: Electronic Funds Transfer Point of Sale
servicetype.servip: Payments for purchases and e-Dirham card reloads can be made through new e-Dirham electronic collection machines (EFTPOS) that are in line with latest international networks. These machines will accept payments through any Visa or MasterCard in addition to the e-Dirham cards.

servicetype.title: Online Payment & e-Commerce
servicetype.servip: Payment for service fees for e-Dirham subscribed entities is not limited to e-Dirham cards.The system will accept payments through any Visa or MasterCard via Points of Sale Terminals (EFTPOS) and the Internet (EIPG).
